question: is nikah valid - I married my husband by performing nikah.I was a hindu before but only accepted islam for completing the nikah ceremony
answer:
QUESTION
Salaam alaiykum,I married my husband by performing nikah.I was a hindu before but only accepted islam for completing the nikah ceremony on insistence of my in laws. i had no intention of following islam. it was an agreement between my husband and me that i would follow my own religion after marriage i however after few years after marrige accepted islam on my own and i am a practising muslim now. after reading and learning about islam now i have doubts about the validity of my marriage please advise
ANSWER


Share:
The fact that you accepted Islam even though you had no intention of
following it practically, makes you a Muslim. Your Nikah was valid.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
